Components.English: V, S, M (ruby dust worth 50 gp, which the spell consumes)
Components.Material Description: ruby dust worth 50 gp, which the spell consumes

Effect: A flame, equivalent in brightness to a torch, springs forth from an object that you touch. The effect looks like a regular flame, but it creates no heat and doesn't use oxygen. A *continual flame* can be covered or hidden but not smothered or quenched.
Name: Continual Flame
